Message.default: {version} is beschikbaar om te downloaden. Klik voor meer informatie.
Message.android: xBrowserSync {version} is beschikbaar om te downloaden.

Message.default: xBrowserSync is bijgewerkt met de nieuwste functies en foutreparaties. Klik voor uitgavenotities.
Bladwijzereigenschappen worden opgehaald, tik om te annuleren.
Wijzigingen worden gesynchroniseerd wanneer de verbinding is hersteld.

Description.default: Browsersynchronisatie zoals het hoort: veilig, anoniem en gratis! Synchroniseer bladwijzers tussen uw browsers en apparaten, geen aanmelding vereist.

ContainerChanged_Message.default: Probeer a.u.b. geen wijzigen aan [xbs]-mappen te maken, omdat dit synchronisatieproblemen kan veroorzaken.

DailyNewSyncLimitReached_Message.default: Synchroniseer met een bestaande synchronisatie-ID, schakel over naar een andere dienst of probeer het morgen opnieuw.

Default_Message.default: Als het probleem zich blijft voordoen, ga dan naar om het probleem te melden.

InvalidCredentials_Message.default: Controleer of je synchronisatie-ID, wachtwoord en service-URL correct zijn ingevoerd.

InvalidService_Message.default: De service-URL is geen geldige xBrowserSync-service.

LocalContainerNotFound_Message.default: Mogelijk beschadigd browserprofiel. Probeer een nieuw profiel te maken, aangezien dit het probleem kan oplossen.

LocalSyncError_Message.default: Lokale gegevens zijn vernieuwd. Pas de laatste wijziging opnieuw toe.

MissingClientData_Message.default: Kan opgeslagen inloggegevens niet vinden. Schakel synchronisatie opnieuw in en probeer het opnieuw.

NoDataToRestore_Message.default: Zorg ervoor dat er een geldige xBrowserSync-back-up is opgegeven voordat je herstelt.

NotAcceptingNewSyncs_Message.default: Schakel over naar een andere service of probeer het later opnieuw.

OutOfSync_Message.default: Lokale gegevens waren niet gesynchroniseerd en zijn nu vernieuwd. Pas de laatste wijziging opnieuw toe.

RequestEntityTooLarge_Message.default: Verwijder enkele bladwijzers en probeer het opnieuw of schakel over naar een service met een grotere synchronisatielimiet.

ScanFailed_Message.default: Controleer of toestemming is verleend en probeer het opnieuw.

ServiceOffline_Message.default: The xBrowserSync service is currently offline, try again later.

SyncRemoved_Message.default: The requested sync does not exist, it may have been removed due to inactivity.

SyncVersionNotSupported_Message.default: This ID cannot be synced with this version of xBrowserSync as the sync has been upgraded to a later version.

SyncVersionNotSupported_Restore_Message.default: The backup data cannot be restored by this version of xBrowserSync as it was created with a later version.

TooManyRequests_Message.default: Sync has been disabled, re-enable sync to resume syncing.

UncommittedSyncs_Message.default: Sync will be committed once connection to service is restored.

UnsupportedServiceApiVersion_Message.default: This service is running an unsupported API version.

UpgradeFailed_Message.android: Upgrade will be retried on restarting the app. If the problem persists please reinstall xBrowserSync.
UpgradeFailed_Message.default: Restart your browser to retry upgrade, if the problem persists please reinstall xBrowserSync.

Exists.default: De URL is reeds al bladwijzer toegevoegd

Description.default: Description

InvalidUrlShared.default: The value that was shared does not contain a valid URL.

AddingBookmarks.default:
Adding a bookmark

Bookmark the current page by clicking on the bookmark icon in the Search panel. The bookmark’s properties will be populated for you automatically, otherwise add a description and some tags to ensure better search results.

Alternatively, simply click the browser’s “Bookmark this page” button as normal and xBrowserSync will automatically populate the bookmark’s properties (optional permissions must be granted for this to work, check the Settings panel).
AddingBookmarks.android:
Adding a bookmark

Add bookmarks easily by sharing to xBrowserSync from any apps that share URLs such as browsers, YouTube, Spotify and many more.

The bookmark’s properties will be fetched for you, otherwise add a description and some tags to ensure better search results.

BackingUp.default:
Remember to back up

When you use xBrowserSync your data is your responsibility so be smart and make sure to take backups.

Head over to the Settings panel and back up your unencrypted data to a local file which can be used to restore your data should you need to.

If your local browser data becomes corrupted and you don’t have any backups, you can at any time revert your data back to it’s original state from when xBrowserSync was installed.
BackingUp.android:
Remember to back up

When you use xBrowserSync your data is your responsibility so be smart and make sure to take backups.

Head over to the Settings panel and back up your unencrypted data to a local file which can be used to restore your data should you need to.

BeforeYouBegin.default:
Before you begin

xBrowserSync modifies your local browser data so it’s a good idea to back up your bookmarks and other browser data just in case, and if you are using any other browser sync services or tools (such as Google Chrome Sync) please disable them to avoid conflicts.
BeforeYouBegin.brave:
Before you begin

xBrowserSync modifies your local browser data so it’s a good idea to back up your bookmarks and other browser data just in case, and if you are using any other browser sync services or tools (such as Brave Sync) please disable them to avoid conflicts.
BeforeYouBegin.edge:
Before you begin

xBrowserSync modifies your local browser data so it’s a good idea to back up your bookmarks and other browser data just in case, and if you are using any other browser sync services or tools (such as Microsoft Edge Sync) please disable them to avoid conflicts.
BeforeYouBegin.firefox:
Before you begin

xBrowserSync modifies your local browser data so it’s a good idea to back up your bookmarks and other browser data just in case, and if you are using any other browser sync services or tools (such as Firefox Sync) please disable them to avoid conflicts.

ExistingId.default:
Syncing with your existing ID

Click on “Already got a sync ID?” to enter your existing sync ID and password. If your sync ID was created on a service different to the one displayed then switch to that service before attempting to sync.

xBrowserSync will retrieve and decrypt your encrypted data using your locally stored password, then clear your local bookmarks before re-populating them from the decrypted data.

When synced, xBrowserSync checks in the background every fifteen minutes for updates to your synced data and will automatically update your local bookmarks when required. You can also manually sync available updates to your synced data in the Settings panel.
ExistingId.android:
Syncing with your existing ID

Start by scanning the sync ID QR code in the Settings panel of the xBrowserSync desktop browser extension (click on your sync ID to reveal it). Make sure you enter the same encryption password used when creating the sync otherwise xBrowserSync will not be able to decrypt your data.

Also, if you are synced to a different xBrowserSync service make sure it is the active service configured in the Settings panel.

FirstSync.default:
Syncing for the first time

Before xBrowserSync can sync your browser data you will need to provide an encryption password. Be sure to make it strong but also memorable, there are no resets or reminders so if you forget it you won’t be able to access your synced data.

Your browser data will be encrypted using your password and saved to the active xBrowserSync service configured in the Settings panel.

Once synced, any changes you make to your local bookmarks will be synced automatically by xBrowserSync.
FirstSync.android:
Syncing for the first time

xBrowserSync actively syncs your browser data between your desktop browsers (syncing to mobile browsers is not supported at this time), you can use this app to access your synced data on your Android mobile device.

If you have not already created a sync ID, head over to your desktop browser and download the xBrowserSync extension. Once you have created a sync you can use your new sync ID within this app to access your data.

FurtherSupport.default:
Further support

You can find the answers to most common questions in the FAQs, also check the current known issues to see if your issue is listed there.

Alternatively, use the issue tracker to report an issue or request a new feature.

Mobile.default:
Go mobile

Access your synced bookmarks on the move with the xBrowserSync Android app, available on Google Play store, F-Droid or direct download.

NativeFeatures.default:
Native features supported

Feel free to continue using your browser’s native bookmarking features such as the bookmarks bar and bookmarks manager, any changes you make will be synced automatically in the background.

If you have organised your existing bookmarks into folders don’t worry, xBrowserSync will respect and maintain your existing bookmarks hierarchy.
NativeFeatures.firefox:
Native features supported

Feel free to continue using your browser’s native bookmarking features such as the bookmarks toolbar and bookmarks library, any changes you make will be synced automatically in the background.

If you have organised your existing bookmarks into folders don’t worry, xBrowserSync will respect and maintain your existing bookmarks hierarchy.

Please note however, as Firefox’s bookmarks API does not yet support accessing native bookmark tags, any existing tags will be lost when syncing and tags added via xBrowserSync will not be saved as native tags.

Searching.default:
Bladwijzers doorzoeken

Druk na synchronisatie op Enter om je recente bladwijzers weer te geven of typ enkele trefwoorden of een URL om je bladwijzers te doorzoeken.

Schakel tussen zoekresultaten en bladwijzermappen om door de hele hiërarchie te bladeren.

Om een bladwijzer te bewerken of te verwijderen, beweeg je de muisaanwijzer over de bladwijzer en klik je op het dan zichtbare bewerkingspictogram naast de titel van de bladwijzer.
Searching.android:
Bladwijzers doorzoeken

Na synchronisatie worden je bladwijzers in chronologische volgorde weergegeven wanneer je xBrowserSync opent. Typ enkele trefwoorden of een URL in het zoekvak om je bladwijzers te doorzoeken.

Schakel tussen zoekresultaten en bladwijzermappen om door de hele hiërarchie te bladeren.

Door lang op een bladwijzer te drukken, kun je deze rechtstreeks delen, wijzigen of verwijderen.

Service.default:
Synchronisatie met een andere service

Standaard worden je gegevens gesynchroniseerd met de officiële xBrowserSync-service, maar als je je gegevens wilt synchroniseren met een alternatieve xBrowserSync-service, kun je de actieve service wijzigen voordat u synchroniseert.

Controleer de lijst met beschikbare openbare xBrowserSync-services of draai je eigen service , hetzij voor privégebruik voor ultieme veiligheid en privacy, of voor openbaar gebruik zodat meer mensen kunnen genieten van xBrowserSync.

Belangrijk: xBrowserSync diensten worden onafhankelijk gerund door vrijwilligers. De servicebeheerder is niet verantwoordelijk voor jouw gegevens, dus vergeet niet om regelmatig een back-up te maken.

Shortcuts.default:
Use shortcuts!

To search your bookmarks quickly, use the default keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Space) to activate the extension, then simply press Enter to view your recent bookmarks or start typing to search.

To change the shortcut, browse to chrome://extensions/shortcuts and update the available shortcuts under xBrowserSync.
Shortcuts.brave:
Use shortcuts!

To search your bookmarks quickly, use the default keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Space) to activate the extension, then simply press Enter to view your recent bookmarks or start typing to search.

To change the shortcut, browse to brave://extensions/shortcuts and update the available shortcuts under xBrowserSync.
Shortcuts.edge:
Use shortcuts!

To search your bookmarks quickly, use the default keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Space) to activate the extension, then simply press Enter to view your recent bookmarks or start typing to search.

To change the shortcut, browse to edge://extensions/shortcuts and update the available shortcuts under xBrowserSync.
Shortcuts.firefox:
Use shortcuts!

To search your bookmarks quickly, use the default keyboard shortcut (Ctrl+Space) to activate the extension, then simply press Enter to view your recent bookmarks or start typing to search.

To change the shortcut, browse to about:addons, click on “Manage Extension Shortcuts” in the Settings menu and update the available shortcuts under xBrowserSync.

SyncId.default:
Your sync ID

xBrowserSync ensures your privacy as no personal data is ever collected and your browser data is encrypted before being synced. To identify your synced data you are provided with an anonymous sync ID which can be used along with your password to sync your data on other browsers and devices.

Remember that your sync ID will only work with the xBrowserSync service on which it was created, if you switch to a different xBrowserSync service you must create a new sync or use an existing sync ID created when previously synced to that service.

Whenever you are synced you can view your sync ID in the Settings panel, click it to reveal a handy QR code to scan when syncing on mobile devices.

Welcome.default:
Welcome to xBrowserSync!

xBrowserSync is a free and open-source alternative to browser sync services offered by Google, Mozilla, Opera and others, that respects your privacy and gives you complete anonymity (check out the website for more info).

Take a moment to read through this help guide to familiarise yourself with xBrowserSync, using the paging links below or the arrow keys to move between pages.

Please note: xBrowserSync currently only syncs bookmarks. Syncing of additional browser data will be added in future versions, check out the development roadmap to see what’s planned.
Welcome.android:
Welcome to xBrowserSync!

xBrowserSync is a free and open-source alternative to browser sync services offered by Google, Mozilla, Opera and others, that respects your privacy and gives you complete anonymity (check out the website for more info).

Take a moment to read through this help guide to familiarise yourself with xBrowserSync, using the paging links below or swiping to move between pages.

Please note: xBrowserSync currently only syncs bookmarks. Syncing of additional browser data will be added in future versions, check out the development roadmap to see what’s planned.

Content.default: Download de xBrowserSync-desktopbrowser-extensie en maak een nieuwe synchronisatie om hier toegang te krijgen tot je bladwijzers.
Open xBrowserSync in je desktopbrowser, ga naar het paneel Instellingen en klik op je synchronisatie-ID om een QR-code weer te geven die je hier kunt scannen.

Description.default: Voer de URL in van een alternatieve xBrowserSync-service. Blader hier door de lijst met openbare xBrowserSync-services.

Failed.default: Unable to connect to the service

NotSupported.default: This service is running an unsupported API version

Warning.default: Important: xBrowserSync services are run independently by volunteers. The service administrator takes no responsibility for your data so please remember to backup regularly.

Content.default: xBrowserSync will delete all local bookmarks data before restoring synced bookmarks. OK to proceed?

Syncing your browser data with xBrowserSync whilst other bookmark sync tools (such as Google Chrome Sync) are active can cause duplication and possibly corrupted data. Please disable them before continuing.
Content.brave: Syncing your browser data with xBrowserSync whilst other bookmark sync tools (such as Brave Sync) are active can cause duplication and possibly corrupted data. Please disable them before continuing.
Content.edge: Syncing your browser data with xBrowserSync whilst other bookmark sync tools (such as Microsoft Edge Sync) are active can cause duplication and possibly corrupted data. Please disable them before continuing.
Content.firefox: Syncing your browser data with xBrowserSync whilst other bookmark sync tools (such as Firefox Sync) are active can cause duplication and possibly corrupted data. Please disable them before continuing.

Content.default:
This sync ID must be upgraded in order to sync with this version of xBrowserSync. After upgrading, you will not be able to sync with previous versions of xBrowserSync.

Ensure you have updated all of your xBrowserSync apps before continuing. Ready to proceed?

Description.default: Your sync ID

Content.default:
xBrowserSync automatically enriches bookmarks added using the browser’s Add Bookmark button with available metadata. To enable this, xBrowserSync requires additional permissions to be able to read visited website data.

Please indicate if prompted if you are happy to grant these permissions, alternatively you can add or remove permissions at any time in the Settings panel.

Title.default: Scan your sync ID QR code

Placeholder.default: Hit Enter or search for bookmarks

NoBookmarks.default: You have no bookmarks, go add some!

Local.default: Back up local browser data to a file.

Synced.default: Back up synced data to a file.

Description.default: Restore local browser data from a backup.

Confirm.default:
As sync is currently disabled, the data being restored will overwrite the local browser data.

OK to proceed?

Description.default: Restore synced data from a backup.

Confirm.default:
As sync is currently enabled, the data being restored will overwrite your synced data.

To restore data to the local browser only, disable sync before restoring.

OK to proceed?
Confirm.android:
The data being restored will overwrite your synced data.

OK to proceed?

Placeholder.default: Select a backup file to restore

Copy.default: Copy the contents of a backup file to restore data.

Confirm.default:
If you continue, any active sync will be disabled and your local data will be reverted to when xBrowserSync was installed on {date}.

OK to proceed?

Unavailable.default: Installation state data not available, unable to revert.

Description.default: Got a question or having an issue? Make sure to read through the help guide, otherwise the answer may be in the FAQs.
Report an issue to report a bug or request a new feature.
Download and include the application log when you log an issue.
Required to automatically add metadata to bookmarks when using the browser’s “Bookmark this page” button (more info).
Retrieve metadata automatically when adding a bookmark.
Display an alert when a new version of xBrowserSync is available.
Ideal for use in low-light environments.
Display bookmark folders by default.
Show search bar beneath results.
Disable this setting to display different toolbar bookmarks across synced browsers.

Confirmation.default:
Enabling this setting will replace the bookmarks currently in the bookmarks toolbar with your synced bookmarks.

OK to proceed?

Description.default: Use your sync ID to connect to your synced data on other devices (click to reveal QR code).
How much of the sync data allowed by the service are you using.
Scan this QR code using the xBrowserSync Android app to connect to your synced data.

NotAvailable.default: Settings available when sync is enabled.

FileDownloaded.default: If the file did not download automatically, right click on the link below and “Save link as...”.

Content.default:
We want to make xBrowserSync the number one browser sync tool, but there’s still a lot to do:

  • Add syncing of browser tabs and history
  • Support all major desktop browsers
  • Translate into other languages
  • And much more!

Only with your support can we continue to improve xBrowserSync and ensure that it remains an effective tool in protecting our privacy and productivity against the rot of big tech!
xBrowserSync has been updated with the latest features and fixes. For more details about the changes contained in this release, check out the release notes.
